param.name: published

param.name: access
param.label: Access Level
param.description: Set the frontend access level of this category

param.name: maps_id
param.label: Map
param.description: The map on which you want to place the marker.

param.description: The latitude coordinate of the marker. Click the map to drop a marker and drag it to adjust the coordinates.
